VIII.iv.6.B.5.f
.
Obtaining Records in 1151 Claims
Ensure that the following evidence has been obtained prior to deciding a claim for benefits under
38 U.S.C. 1151
:
records from a VA facility that provided hospital or other care alleged to have resulted in additional disability or death
records of vocational rehabilitation services documenting incurrence of disability or death
records of participation in CWT resulting in incurrence of disability or death, and/or
any non-VA records pertaining to treatment for the injury or death identified by the Veteran or claimant, as directed in
M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, 2.C
and
M21-1, Part III, Subpart ii, 1.A
.
Reference
: For additional information on development required, including requests for VA records, for claims under
38 U.S.C. 1151
, see
M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, 6.A
.
